notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected structures at Um Gargour refugee camp in Al Qadrif province, Sudan as seen on 05 January 2014 by the WorldView-2 satellite. This camp lies 58 km North-East from Al Qadarif city and 90 km South New Halfa. UNOSAT analyzed a total of 4,471 structures in the 206 ha of the camp. This is a preliminary analysis & has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
